q: Vint Cerf said Eric Schmidt , 55, had been chief executive for 10 years-`` a nice round number''- and Larry Page , now 37, was ready to lead the company into the future. Larry Page and Sergey Brin are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said.`` He was the only guy that stood up to them- these were two young, smart, incredibly brilliant guys who literally had just dropped their PhDs to go start this company.
